user_query:
So they go in there, they're eating a good meal and they're just talking about this stuff. And then it was funny because they had spicy food. He's like, I can handle spicy, Peter. And then he's, no, oh yeah, it's funny because he's, and then after that, Hwang Tae-sul said, he's a singer that he's a student. He just wants to go the university. Psychist, sing in the contest. And then, I, okay, that's here. So he started singing and everyone like, boom, oh really? Oh my god, if the students heard you singing like that, they'll protest you just for you to stop. Oh wow, well you can, stop that good.

So next, you know, they're sleeping right there and boom, MBC TV station, it's on fire right now. All right, and they see that. But next we also see reporter Jae-sik. He's trying to print everything. He has a bunch of things printed, but guess what? His boss comes in playing, are you trying to shut us down? Everyone could lose their money because the, it is true, if you get it, because they were stopping media outlets. They're censoring, but they also shut down their pressings, everything. So I guess, I don't know if MBC says, I don't know who was burning that building. I don't know if it was the protest or that was actually the government. Most likely the government cuz maybe they said something and one of their newscasts. And then when they caught it, boom.

entities.entity_description: 황태술은 학생이자 가수로, 대학에 가고 싶어하며 콘테스트에서 노래하기를 원하는 인물이다
피터는 황태술과 함께 식사를 하며 매운 음식에 대해 이야기하는 인물이다
재식은 기자로서 인쇄물을 출력하려고 시도하는 인물이다
MBC TV 방송국은 불이 난 장소로, 정부의 언론 탄압과 관련된 것으로 보인다

relationships.relationship_description: 황태술과 피터는 함께 식사를 하며 대화를 나누는 관계이다
재식은 MBC TV 방송국과 관련된 기자로서 인쇄물을 출력하려 한다

MBC TV STATION.description: MBC TV STATION -> MBC TV STATION
